title: Advances in asymmetric moist-electric generators with innovative heterogeneous structures
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02252A, Review Article
Kun Ni, Qinyi Ren, Shanfei Liu, Baoquan Sun, Ying-Chih Lai, Xiaohong Zhang, Ruiyuan Liu
This review provides a comprehensive account of high-performance asymmetric moist-electric generators spanning from their fundamental research to real-world applications.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
